name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a city, fishing port, tourism centre and district headquarters in southeastern Bangladesh. It is famous mostly for its long natural sandy beach.

name: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is known for its tea gardens, lush green hills, and scenic beauty.

name: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra, and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal.

name: Sajek
description: Sajek Valley is a beautiful destination in the Chittagong Hill Tracts, known for its lush green hills, scenic views, and serene atmosphere.
